# CA Final - Group I

The **pinnacle** of your CA journey.

## What You Will Learn

- **Paper 1** - Financial Reporting
- **Paper 2** - Strategic Financial Management
- **Paper 3** - Advanced Auditing
- **Paper 4** - Corporate & Economic Laws

## Exam Pattern

| SFM | 100 |

slides.title: Business Combinations
slides.content:
# Ind AS 103

## Acquisition Method

```
1. Identify acquirer
2. Determine acquisition date
3. Recognize assets and liabilities
4. Recognize goodwill or bargain purchase
```

## Goodwill

```
Consideration
+ NCI
+ Previously held equity
- Fair value of net assets
= Goodwill
```

## Impairment

- Annual testing
- CGU level

slides.title: Valuation
slides.content:
# Business Valuation

## Methods

| Method | Basis |
|--------|-------|
| DCF | Cash flows |
| Asset based | Net assets |
| Market | Comparables |
| Economic profit | EVA |

## DCF Model

```
Enterprise Value = PV of FCF + Terminal Value

Equity Value = EV - Debt
```

## Multiples

- P/E ratio
- EV/EBITDA
- EV/Sales
